DOC.brief_summary: Multi-center , prospective randomize dose safety research study . A maximum 150 men enrol study . Qualifying patient receive one three possible dos study drug . Symptoms evaluate treatment , 1-week , 1-month , 3-months , 6-months follow treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Safety/Tolerability Study Alcohol Injection Treatment BPH ( Enlarged Prostate )
DOC.criteria: Eligible patient 50 80yearold men experience follow urinary symptom least 6 month : frequent urgent need urinate difficulty start urinary stream interruption urinary stream feel incomplete empty bladder urinate interruption sleep due urge urinate Patients tried oral medication condition past , willing discontinue current BPH medication period time undergo study treatment . They good general health previous surgery , procedure ( ) intend reduce prostate size .
